-- Signal Repeater: Outputs a signal, pauses 250ms, repeats 10 times

_G.repeatCount = 0
_G.maxRepeats = 10
_G.signalDelay = 0.25  -- 250ms in seconds

system.print("Signal Repeater Started")
system.print("Will send signal 10 times with 250ms pause between each")

-- Send first signal
unit.sendSignal("signal_out", 1)
_G.repeatCount = 1
system.print("Signal 1/10 sent")

-- Set timer for next signal
if _G.repeatCount < _G.maxRepeats then
    unit.setTimer("repeat_signal", _G.signalDelay)
else
    system.print("All signals sent. Complete!")
end

-- Timer handler: sends signal and schedules next one

if timerId == "repeat_signal" then
    -- Send signal
    unit.sendSignal("signal_out", 1)
    _G.repeatCount = _G.repeatCount + 1
    system.print("Signal " .. _G.repeatCount .. "/" .. _G.maxRepeats .. " sent")
    
    -- Schedule next signal if not done
    if _G.repeatCount < _G.maxRepeats then
        unit.setTimer("repeat_signal", _G.signalDelay)
    else
        system.print("All signals sent. Complete!")
    end
end
